description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow changes in the design, in relation to planning permission reference 216832FUL dated 11/10/2022 for 'Demolition of existing building and erection of industrial/warehouse unit (Class E(g)(iii), Class B2 and/or B8 uses) with ancillary office space and associated car, HGV and cycle parking, fencing, gates and landscaping.'
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0100 REV P03: Site Location Plan; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0101 REV P08: Block Plan; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0102 REV P02: Existing Site Layout; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0106 REV P01: Existing Elevations; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0107 REV P01: Existing Roof Plan; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0103 REV P11: Proposed Site Layout; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0104

REV P08: Proposed Office Plans; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0105 REV P07: Proposed Elevations; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0108 REV P06: Proposed Roof Plan; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0109 REV P07: Proposed Site Sections; 20293-RPS-SI-XX-DR-A-0110 REV P06: Proposed Building Plan; JSL4071_100 REV D: Landscape Strategy Plan; JSL4071_501 REV C: Detailed Planting Plan 1 of 2; JSL4071_502 REV C: Detailed Planting Plan 2 of 2
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
